dct_title_s: Route map of journey through North China and Inner Mongolia by Dr. Bushell
dct_description_sm: Great Wall between Huai an hien and Chien an hien and Inner Great Wall in vicinity of Peking are shown. Area of extent of Peking (Beijing) is shown. 1st, 2nd, and 3rd order cities shown with symbols. Ming tombs, East Imper[ia]l tombs, and Wei Chang Imperial Hunting Grounds are shown. Author's route shown in red. Scale is given in English miles, geographical miles, and Chinese li. From: The Journal of the Royal Geographical Society of London. Vol. 44 (1874), pp. 73-97; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J687 v. 44 1874
